programme.title: The Treacherous
programme.desc: An egoistic official hunts beautiful woman to serve them as his King’s consort, but he’s not the only one.

programme.title: Life Risking Romance
programme.desc: What would you do if the love of your life were a serial killer? A crime novel writer Han Jane has become a nuisance to her neighbors by often mistaking her neighbors as suspects of crime. One day, she hears someone’s scream from upstairs and decides that the person upstairs is the serial killer on loose. While Jane keeps pursuing the serial killer with help of Jason and her childhood friend, she witnesses a shocking scene that changes everything she had believed so far.

programme.title: Closed School
programme.desc: After a crash, Yura and friends wake up at their closed school, terrified and unsure why they're there.

programme.title: Best Friend
programme.desc: Dae-kwon is a NIS agent specializing in wiretapping. On the verge of demotion, he receives an order from Mr. Kim, his senior: surveilling a well-known politician and his family in house arrest. That politician, Lee Eui-min, is the opposition party's frontrunner for the next presidency. Disguising as next-door neighbors, Dae-kwon and his team must find evidence to stop him from running.

programme.title: Possessed
programme.desc: Hee-jin's sister vanishes, leading to a string of mysterious deaths in their neighborhood related to her.

programme.title: The Huntresses
programme.desc: Joseon's best bounty hunter, Jin-ok, takes on a high-reward case, unaware it points to her father's killer.

programme.title: Mood of the day
programme.desc: On the train to Busan, Soo-jung meets Jae-hyun, self-proclaimed Agapemonite, embracing one-night stands.

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman grows tired of life in the city and returns to her hometown in the countryside.

programme.title: Manhole
programme.desc: Down the manhole, a breathtaking showdown unfolds between the two sisters and the serial killer.

programme.title: Citizen of A Kind
programme.desc: After losing her fortune in a scam, Duk-hee sets out to rescue the scammer in China to reclaim her lost money.

programme.title: Innocent Thing
programme.desc: A high school student develops a crush on her gym teacher.

programme.title: The Concubine
programme.desc: Hwa-yeon, a concubine, faces palace danger after the king's death. A bloody fate awaits all within the palace.
